description: General types used for recordings of actions performed in the inspected page.

types.description: Information about the initial state of the recorded object.

properties.name: attributes
properties.description: Key-value map for each attribute of the state.

properties.name: states
properties.description: Array of saved states of the context.

properties.name: parameters
properties.description: Array of values that were used to construct the recorded object.

properties.name: content
properties.description: Current content at the start of the recording.

types.description: Container object for a single frame of the recording.

properties.name: actions
properties.description: Information about an action made to the recorded object. Follows the structure [name, parameters, swizzleTypes, trace, snapshot], where name is a string, parameters is an array, swizzleTypes is an array, trace is an array, and snapshot is a data URL image of the current contents after this action.

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Total execution time of all actions recorded in this frame in milliseconds.

properties.name: incomplete
properties.description: Flag indicating if the recording was stopped before this frame ended.

properties.name: initialState
properties.description: JSON data of inital state of object before recording.

properties.name: data
properties.description: Array of objects that can be referenced by index. Used to avoid duplicating objects.
